verblex: 1. To cook food on a barbecue. English = barbecue.
2. To cook food in a pan that contains hot fat or oil. English = fry.
3. To cook something using strong heat directly above or below it. English = grill.
nomlex: 1. A grill that you use to cook food outdoors; an outdoor party at which people eat food cooked on an outdoor grill. English = barbecue.
